item.title: ZDNet: Best Web Office Products of 2006
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Web Office Suite: best of breed products - I personally use Gmail, Writely and Basecamp from this list. All great products, I just recently completely moved all my email to Gmail, it's one of the best software migrations I've done in a while!
item.excerpt:encoded: Web Office Suite: best of breed products - I personally use Gmail, Writely and Basecamp from this list. All great products, I just recently completely moved all my email to Gmail, it's one of the best software migrations I've done in a while!
